id.label: User ID *
id.hint: Enter your user ID which should be unique.

captionTemplate.existing: Welcome back {userName}! Do you want to modify booking {bookingId}?
captionTemplate.new: Welcome {userName}! Input following to book now!

specialOfferDate.description: You can get special offer! When do you want to receive?
specialOfferDate.label: When will you receive special offer? *
specialOfferDate.hint: Specify the day in your stay.

mealOffers.label: Special meal offers
mealOffers.hint: For other offers, tell us with note on end of this input form.

smoking.title: I want to do smoking in my room
smoking.label: Smoking *
smoking.hint: Specify you want do smoking or not. Note that you cannot do smoking in any space outside of the room.

persons.label: Persons *
persons.hint: Cound children under 12 years old as 0.5, and round up in total.

babyBeds.label: Baby beds *
babyBeds.hint: Specify baby beds. If you want to more than 2 beds, tell us with note on end of this input form.

preferredPrice.label: Preferred price range *
preferredPrice.hint: Specify preferred price range you want to pay.

note.label: Note
note.hint: Enter note of this booking including special meal offers.

acceptsTermsOfUse.title: I read terms of use (*) and accept it.
acceptsTermsOfUse.message: Accepting the terms of use is required.
